column5:
Welcome to my Numberdrop game.

#Newline* Put the numbers onto one of the 4 rows.
#Newline* When they equal the row total#Comma they disappear.
#Newline* If there's a number you don't want to use#Comma put it in the recycle bin for later.
#Newline* Try not to BUST a row by overloading it.
#Newline* The numbers range from 1 to 11 with twice as much chance of getting a 10 or 11 than any other number.
#Newline* Clear all of the rows to win the game.

#NewlineType START to play Numberdrop.

<think>#Newline<set name="a1">?</set>#Newline<set name="a2">?</set>#Newline<set name="a3">?</set>#Newline<set name="a4">?</set>#Newline<set name="a5">?</set>#Newline<set name="a6">?</set>#Newline<set name="b1">?</set>#Newline<set name="b2">?</set>#Newline<set name="b3">?</set>#Newline<set name="b4">?</set>#Newline<set name="b5">?</set>#Newline<set name="b6">?</set>#Newline<set name="c1">?</set>#Newline<set name="c2">?</set>#Newline<set name="c3">?</set>#Newline<set name="c4">?</set>#Newline<set name="c5">?</set>#Newline<set name="c6">?</set>#Newline<set name="d1">?</set>#Newline<set name="d2">?</set>#Newline<set name="d3">?</set>#Newline<set name="d4">?</set>#Newline<set name="d5">?</set>#Newline<set name="d6">?</set>#Newline<set name="r1">?</set>#Newline<set name="r2">?</set>#Newline<set name="r3">?</set>#Newline<set name="r4">?</set>#Newline<set name="r5">?</set>#Newline<set name="r6">?</set>#Newline<set name="anext">a1</set>#Newline<set name="bnext">b1</set>#Newline<set name="cnext">c1</set>#Newline<set name="dnext">d1</set>#Newline<set name="atot">32</set>#Newline<set name="btot">32</set>#Newline<set name="ctot">32</set>#Newline<set name="dtot">32</set>#Newline<set name="afin">0</set>#Newline<set name="bfin">0</set>#Newline<set name="cfin">0</set>#Newline<set name="dfin">0</set>#Newline<set name="recyclemessage">0</set>#Newline</think>#Newline<srai>BXDISPLAYBOARD</srai>#Newline<srai>BXCHOOSENUMBER</srai>
